permissions_denied_action: Your permissions can not perform this action.
email_constraint:
The standard email should have the format: <username>@<domain>.<domain>. 
Starts with one or more alphanumeric characters, an underscore (_) or a period (.).
Followed by an '@' character.
Followed by one or more alphabetic characters, number or underscore.
 Followed by a period (.) and one or two alphabetic characters, for example: .com, .edu, .gov, .org, .net, .info, .biz, . io, ...
Email address contains no spaces or special characters other than underscore (_) or period (.).
account_name_constraint: Minimum name length 1 and maximum 50 characters.
password_constraint:
Password:
At least 8 characters.
Contains at least one uppercase letter and one lowercase letter.
Contains at least one number and one special character.
email_was_registered_by_other_person: Email was registered by other person.
account_bantime: Your account is not authorized until:
skill_name_constraint: Minimum Skill length 1 and maximum 30 characters.
pdf_file_limit_size_kb: File PDF size is limited {{size}} KB.
image_file_limit_size_kb: File image size is limited {{size}} KB.
verify_email_content_email_template:
Hello {{name}}!
To verify this email please visit the link below:
{{verify_url}}
(Token is valid for {{token_time}} minutes)
 From Startup Map Server
 This is an automated email, please do not respond .
reset_password_content_email_template:
Hello {{name}}!
To reset your password, please visit the link below:
{{reset_password_url}}
(Token is valid for {{token_time}} minutes)
From Startup Map Server
This is an automated email, please do not respond .
account_skills_not_exist: Skills of account are not exist.
cv_name_constraint: Minimum name length 1 and maximum 50 characters.
team_name_constraint: Minimum name length 1 and maximum {{length}} characters.
is_not_member: You were not a member before.
new_leader_unvalid: New leader, you choose, is unvalid.
post_content_constraint: Minimum Content length 1 and Maximum Content length {{length}} characters.
